title: Teenagers Face Trial for Hacking BT, Nvidia, Rockstar Games, Revolut, Uber
description:
By Waqas

Both teenagers, who are on trial in the United Kingdom, have been accused of being associated with the infamous Lapsus$ hacking group.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: Teenagers Face Trial for Hacking BT, Nvidia, Rockstar Games, Revolut, Uber

title: Fake TeamViewer Installer Used to Deliver njRAT Malware
description:
By Habiba Rashid

A fake and malicious version of TeamViewer is being pushed as legitimate, which in reality infects devices with njRAT Malware (aka Bladabindi).

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: Fake TeamViewer Installer Used to Deliver njRAT Malware

title: BreachForums’ Pompompurin Pleads Guilty to Holding Child Abuse Content
description:
By Waqas

According to court documents, devices owned by Pompompurin contained 600 explicit images of child abuse, which led him to plead guilty in court.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: BreachForums’ Pompompurin Pleads Guilty to Holding Child Abuse Content
